wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Graham Murray, 1st Viscount Dunedin,  (21 November 1849 – 21 August 1942) was a Scottish politician and judge. He served as Secretary for Scotland between 1903 and 1905, as Lord Justice General and Lord President of the Court of Session between 1905 and 1913 and as a Lord of Appeal in Ordinary between 1913 and 1932.

response: * Andrew Murray, 1st Viscount Dunedin (1849–1942), Scottish politician and judge
